enum.name: AndroidExplicitPassphrasePlatformApiResponse
enum.summary: Non-exhaustive set of possible responses for the the API internally called by ExplicitPassphrasePlatformClient (see class docs).

enum.name: BookmarkGUIDSource
enum.summary: Whether a GUID came from BookmarkSpecifics, or, in case it was missing, whether an originator_client_item_id of valid GUID format replaced it or it was left empty.

int.label: GUID cannot be inferred (possibly update with client tag)
Remote and local bookmarks types don't match (URL vs. Folder)
Permanent node creation in an incremental update (deprecated)
Parent entity not found in server
Parent entity not found in server when processing a conflict
Parent node not found locally when processing a conflict
The bookmark's GUID did not match the originator client item ID or client tag
Parent node is not a folder
GUID changed for an already-tracked server ID
Permanent node update received without a server-defined unique tag
Node is descendant of root node, without permanent folder (deprecated)
Non-tombstone is missing a bookmark id
Bookmark id does not exist in model
Bookmark in model is missing sync metadata
Client tag hash does not match bookmark GUID

enum.name: SyncClientToServerMessageContents
enum.summary: Type of a network message sent from the client to the sync server.

enum.name: SyncEntityChange
enum.summary: Type of change of a sync entity. Recorded once for every sync entity whenever it is commited to the server or updated from the server.

enum.name: SyncErrorInfobarTypes
enum.summary: Possible errors that can trigger a sync error infobar.

enum.name: SyncErrorType
enum.summary: Possible errors that can be returned by the sync server.
enum.int: You might want to look at Sync.ThrottledSomeModelTypes to correlate this with throttling of a specific data type, or Sync.ThrottledAllModelTypes for throttling of the whole client.
You might want to look at Sync.BackedOffModelType to see the per-type effect of this.

enum.name: SyncGetUpdatesOrigin
enum.summary: Equivalent to proto SyncEnums.GetUpdatesOrigin: represents a reason for a client to issue a GetUpdates request to the sync server.

int.label: Error in MergeFullSyncData() or ApplyIncrementalSyncChanges(): writing visit data
Error in MergeFullSyncData() or ApplyIncrementalSyncChanges(): writing metadata
(Obsolete) Error in OnURLVisited(): reading visit data. Was never recorded.
(Obsolete) Error in OnURLsDeleted(): reading metadata. Was never recorded.
(Obsolete) Error in OnVisitUpdated(): reading URL data. Was never recorded.
Missing required fields (visit time, originator cache GUID, or redirect entries)
Too new (too far in the future)

enum.name: SyncIncomingInvalidationStatus
enum.summary: Possible outcomes of handling incoming sync invalidations.

int.label: Sync-the-transport can start (Sync-the-feature turned off but initial setup complete)
Sync-the-transport can start (Sync-the-feature turned off with initial setup incomplete
Sync-the-transport can start (Sync-the-feature turned on but initial setup incomplete
Disallowed by the platform (obsolete, was never recorded)
Error returned when applying full updates
Error returned when applying incremental updates
Error returned when applying updates on commit response
Error triggered by update not matching SupportsIncrementalUpdates()
Notes field is not set either in the specifics data or the backup
Notes field is set in the specifics data.
Notes field is set only in the backup
Notes field is set only in the backup but not decryptable
(Obsolete) Set sync allowed by platform. Removed 01/2022.

(Obsolete) Profile destruction. Supposedly meant that Sync was stopped due to the profile being destroyed. However, it was recorded during most profile destructions, even if Sync was never enabled in the first place. We stopped recording this in 2018-06.
(Obsolete) Android Chrome sync setting. Removed on 01/2022.
(Obsolete) Android main sync setting. Removed on 01/2022.
Don't migrate, data type not active
Don't migrate, migration feature flag disabled
Don't undo: already completed or not necessary

enum.name: SyncToSigninMigrationReadingListStep
enum.summary: A step in the ReadingList migration process, within the wider Sync-to-Signin migration.

int.label: Primary account changed access token fetching error
Attempting registration with newly generated keys
Attempting registration while having persistent authentication error (deprecated)
